questions.header: Let's find the right group for you.
questions.description: We’ll ask you five questions that will help us connect you with people who are in a similar spot. (We’ll try to keep the Steelers and Bengals fans separate.)
When you’re finished answering the next five questions, we’ll show you several groups that show similar goals, interests or wants. It’s going to be great. Let’s do this!

questions.header: Have you done a journey with us before?
questions.description: If this is your first journey, it’s OK to be a little nervous. If it’s your second or third time, you might consider hosting a group (we believe in you).
answers: Nope. First time and I'm pumped!

questions.header: What are you hoping to get out of your BRAVE group experience?
questions.description: Pick the one that most represents how you feel.
answers: Not really sure. You said I should join a group, so here I am!
I want to make some friends.
I’m looking for someone I can learn from.

questions.description: Because it’s important for helping you find the right group.
This helps us make sure to save room for your spouse or connect you with couples groups.
answers: I’m married, but we’re going through the journey separately.
I’m married and I want to be in the same group with my spouse.

questions.header: Great! Now we’ll ask you some questions about when you’d like to meet.
questions.description: Remember, BRAVE groups meet once a week for five weeks (starting the week of April 3 and ending the week of May 1). Groups usually take less than 90 minutes from start to finish.

questions.header: Great! Are you free to meet during the week (Mon-Fri)?
questions.description: The more options you check, the better we can find the right group for you.

questions.header: Sweet! Are you free on SATURDAYS and SUNDAYS?
questions.description: The more options you check, the better we can find the right group for you.

Please add your address so we can show the distance between you and your potential groups. A home address may have auto-filled below if you logged in to your Crossroads account. Please update it if we got it wrong.

questions.header: Way to go! We’re matching you to groups.
questions.description: You’ll be matched to several groups who fit your goals, interests and who live closest to you. Scroll through the group profiles, read their description and join the group that’s best for you.
